section.title: can and can't for ability
section.sectiontitle: We use can + verb to say we are able to do something and can't + verb to say we aren't able to do something.
section.text2a: My dog can't walk at the moment.
section.sectiontitle2: In the question, we use can + I/you/he/she/it/we/they + verb.
section.text4a: Can he run fast? No, he can't.
